messages.title: It doesn't have to be like this.
messages.content: I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.

messages.title: There's so much at stake in this election and it's in your hands.
messages.content: I'm talking about your job. I'm talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Cambridge. I'm talking about our right to live, work and travel across Europe.

messages.title: It's your choice, it's your future â€“ help change it by voting Liberal Democrat on 8th June.
messages.content: With thanks and best wishes, Tim Farron

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will fight to stop Theresa May's extreme Brexit wrecking our country's future. Propose that if a bad Brexit deal is brought by Theresa May, people should have a say on whether to accept it or stay in the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats will fight to stop Theresa May's extreme Brexit wrecking our country's future.
issues.health: I'm talking about the future of our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May.

images.caption: Tim Farron, Leader of the Liberal Democrats, rejects Theresa May's extreme Brexit and emphasizes the importance of NHS and schools in Cambridge.
Liberal Democrats believe the public should have the final say on the Brexit deal.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on Tim Farron's objection to the current Brexit strategy and the protection of public services such as the NHS.
